interpretation:
Opener:	 has 13-21 points and 5+ hearts.
	Denies 5 spades
Responder:	Has 6-12 points
	Denies support for hearts
Forcing for 1 round

hints.hint1:
Small=13-15, Medium=16-18, Large=19-21
Look for another suit or 6+ in opening suit
hints.hint2:
13-15	6+H: 2H
	4+D: 2D
	3+C: 2C
	4S: 2S
16-18	6+H: 3H
	4+D: 3D
	3+C: 3C
	4S: 3S
	19-21	W: JS
	6+H, stoppers: 3NT
	18-19 HCP, Bal: 3NT
	7+H: 4H
	6H: 3H
	Default: 3H or 3NT
